entry.title: WIND WARNING , Estevan Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Estevan Point 10:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: 8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 7.9°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections late this afternoon. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
